newsitem.title: USA: Miller Building in school pact.
newsitem.headline: Miller Building in school pact.

text.p: Miller Building Inc said Wednesday it has received a contract valued at more than $2 million to build 25 portable classrooms for various sites in the New York metropolitan area.
The contract was awarded by I-R Inc's In-Roads Mobile and Modular unit.
The classrooms will be built at Miller's Leola, Pennsylvania, facility during the fall and winter, which is traditionally a slow period for the company, Miller said.
